text: Simeon Nyachae (6 February 1932 - 1 February 2021) was a Kenyan politician and businessman. From 1998 to 1999, he was the Minister for Finance during the Daniel arap Moi presidency. He was born in Nairobi, Kenya. Nyachae died on 1 February 2021 in Nairobi, aged 88.Former Cabinet Minister Simeon Nyachae is dead ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Kenyan politicians Category:African businesspeople
title: Simeon Nyachae
